{|class="wikitable" |- !style="width:190px" |DVD Title!!style="width:176px" |Release Date!!Additional Info!!style="width:368px" |Bonus Features |- style="height: 200px" |[[Hannah Montana & Miley Cyrus: Best of Both Worlds Concert]] |[[Region 1|USA/CAN]]: August 19, 2008{{cite web|url=http://www.amazon.com/dp/B001725ZBO/|title=Best of Both Worlds Concert: The 3-D Movie: Extended Edition: Miley Cyrus, Jonas Brothers: Movies & TV|work=amazon.com|accessdate=September 30, 2010}} | Recalling the successful theatrical gimmick, the home video releases are vowed to be sold "for a limited time only". It is on Blu-ray and Disney DVD and is in 3-D, was the first for a Blu-ray release.
The DVD release features four versions of the movie. It's possible to choose between 1:85:1 and 1:33:1, both available in 2D and 3D. The [[Blu-ray]] release features both 2D and 3D but in 1.85:1 only.
A bonus DVD, ''On the Road with Miley'', was released exclusively to US [[Wal-Mart]] stores along with the Disney DVD version of the concert.{{cite web|url=http://www.amazon.com/dp/B001F62UKG|title=Exclusive 2-Pack with Bonus DVD--Hannah Montana and Miley Cyrus -Best of Both Worlds Concer- The 3-D Movie and on the Road with Miley.|publisher=Amazon.com|accessdate=August 27, 2011}} | *"Music & More":{{cite web|url=http://www.ultimatedisney.com/hannahmiley.html|title=Hannah Montana & Miley Cyrus: The Best of Both Worlds Concert DVD Review|work=UltimateDisney.com|accessdate=March 12, 2011}} **"[[SOS (Jonas Brothers song)|S.O.S]]" live performance, by [[Jonas Brothers]] **"[[Good and Broken]]" live performance *"Sing along with the movie" mode *"The Ultimate Personal Tour" |- |[[Hannah Montana: The Movie]] |[[Region 1|USA/CAN]]: August 18, 2009 |The film was released in theaters on April 10, 2009 in the United States and Canada. | *Dylan & Cole Sprouse: Blu-rayâ¢ Is Suite!{{cite web|url=http://www.ultimatedisney.com/hannahmontana-movie.html|title=Hannah Montana: The Movie DVD Review|work=UltimateDisney.com|accessdate=March 12, 2011}} *Four deleted scenes *"Fun with Hannah & The Gang" (outtakes) *"[[The Climb (song)|The Climb]]" music video *"Backstage Disney": **"Find Your Way Back Home" **"I Should Have Gone to Film School - With Jason Earles" **Audio commentary by director [[Peter Chelsom]] Only on the [[Blu-ray]] version: *"[[Back to Tennessee]]" music video, by [[Billy Ray Cyrus]] *"[[You'll Always Find Your Way Back Home]]" music video *"[[Let's Get Crazy (Hannah Montana song)|Let's Get Crazy]]" music video *"[[The Climb (song)|The Climb]] (Movie version)" music video *"[[Bless the Broken Road]]" music video, by [[Rascal Flatts]] *"[[Crazier]]" music video, by [[Taylor Swift]] *"The Hoedown Home Experience": **"Everybody Now..." **"Learn the Moves" |- |Hannah Montana Forever{{cite web|url=http://www.amazon.com/dp/B003WKY0UG|title=Hannah Montana Forever|publisher=Amazon.com|accessdate=August 27, 2011}} |[[Region 1|US]]: 2010 | Released exclusively to US [[Wal-Mart]] stores. Contains four episodes from the fourth season of ''Hannah Montana''. | *Hannah's Highlights: "Miley Hurt The Feelings Of The Radio Star" Episode. |} ===Season releases=== {| class="wikitable" |- !DVD Title!!Release Date!!Episodes!!Additional Info!!Bonus Features |- |The Complete First Season||[[Region 1|USA/CAN]]: November 18, 2008{{cite web|url=http://www.tvshowsondvd.com/news/Hannah-Montana-Season-1/10384|title=Hannah Montana DVD news: Announcement for Hannah Montana - Kickoff Episode * Hannah's Highlights{{cite web|url=http://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B001D07QOE|title=Hannah Montana - Season 1 - Complete [DVD] [2008]: Amazon.co.uk: Miley Cyrus, Emily Osment, Mitchel Musso, Fred Savage, David Kendall, Kenneth Shapiro, Sheldon Epps: DVD|work=Amazon.co.uk|accessdate=September 30, 2010}} |- |Hannah Montana Forever: Final Season ||[[Region 1|USA/CAN]]: March 8, 2011{{cite web|url=http://disneydvd.disney.go.com/hannah-montana-final-season.html|title=Hannah Montana DVD -
